subsystemList.heading: Catalogue of all X-tee subsystems with methods and WSDL descriptions

intro.p1: This catalogue is generated by making getWsdl requests from RIA's Monitoring Security Server to all X-tee subsystems.
intro.p2: Subsystems with the Empty icon have no X-Tee services available.
intro.p3: Subsystems with the Error icon either could not be reached by RIA's Monitoring Security Server or there was some other error during the request.

subsystem.heading: Subsystem {{subsystem}} with methods and WSDL descriptions for X-tee instance "{{instance}}"
subsystem.statusWsdlError: Error while downloading or parsing of WSDL
subsystem.statusErrorInfo: Subsystem either could not be reached by RIA's Monitoring Security Server or there was some other error during the request.
subsystem.statusEmptyInfo: Subsystem does not have any methods.
